txt.en: The Skirmish Panel has two tabs.  The Stats tab allows you to track your overall statistics from Skirmishes, like time played, Lieutenants killed, and Skirmish Mark sources; here you can view both lifetime stats and stats sorted by individual Skirmishes.  The Traits tab shows the Skirmish traits you have acquired, their rank, and what traits you have not earned yet.

The Skirmish Panel has two tabs. The Stats tab allows you to track your overall statistics from Skirmishes, like time played, Lieutenants killed, and Mark sources; here you can view both lifetime stats and stats sorted by individual Skirmishes. The Traits tab shows the Skirmish traits you have acquired, their rank, and what traits you have not earned yet.
